alert.note: Alert for Rock; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 10:18PM CDT until April 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Walworth County in southeastern Wisconsin... Rock County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1018 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Durand to near Marengo, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Janesville, Beloit, Whitewater, Delavan, South Beloit, Milton, Edgerton, Evansville, Brodhead, Walworth, Clinton, Sharon, Darien, Orfordville, Brooklyn, Footville, Richmond, Fulton, La Grange, and Newark. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
